document.full_text: john dowd, a lawyer for raj rajaratnam, ended by saying that all the information on which his client traded was "available to the whole world." the prosecution's rebuttal will continue on monday.
document.title: galleon chief's lawyer presses his argument for acquittal
lines_and_colors: john dowd, a lawyer for raj rajaratnam, ended by saying that all the information on which his client traded was "available to the whole world." the prosecution's rebuttal will continue on monday.
